product_overview: EasyCustomized is a premium black-themed, India-localized platform that connects customers and vendors through a comprehensive classifieds and vendor quote system. Featuring progressive web app capabilities, AI-powered vendor matching, detailed vendor profiles, and a robust admin dashboard, it offers a secure, accessible and seamless experience.
core_goals: Deliver a sleek, neon-themed PWA optimized for Indian market with offline support and mobile installation
Provide a secure, validated multi-role system for customers, vendors, and admins supporting ad posting, browsing, and quoting workflows
Enable efficient vendor matching and quoting with AI-driven recommendations and streamlined communication
Facilitate vendor reputation building through rating and review systems based on real transactions
Offer full-featured admin controls for user management, content moderation, and platform analytics
Ensure accessibility, responsiveness, and error handling for an inclusive user experience
key_features: Full Progressive Web App support with offline mode, install prompts, and multi-platform compatibility
Premium black + neon cyan electric purple theme with glassmorphic UI elements
India-specific localization including INR formatting and 40+ city selections
Four-step Post Ad Wizard with validated inputs, image uploads, and preview
Comprehensive Ad Listing and Detail views with AI vendor recommendations
Structured Vendor Quote System with accept/reject logic and auto-handling of competing quotes
Extensive Vendor Profiles with portfolios, stats, ratings, and reviews
Real-time notification bell for quotes and messages with unread count
Thread-based Messaging system linked to ads and quotes
Admin Dashboard featuring comprehensive user, ad, message, flag management and analytics
AI-driven vendor matching by category, location, keywords, rating, and experience
Classified ads posting and browsing with image support and pricing in INR
Robust input validation, security measures including XSS protection and rate limiting
Accessibility compliance with WCAG AA and responsive mobile-first design
Loading skeletons and error boundaries for better UX during data operations
Optional Supabase backend integration for enhanced persistence and security
user_flow_summary: Customers sign up, browse ads filtered by category and location, view detailed ads, and post new ads via the 4-step wizard
Vendors browse ads matched by AI relevance, submit quotes with pricing and delivery times, manage classified ads, and communicate through threaded messages
Customers receive quotes, review vendor profiles, accept or reject quotes, and leave reviews post engagement
Admins log in to a protected panel to monitor platform metrics, manage users, moderate ads and messages, and handle flagged content
All users receive real-time notifications for relevant events such as new quotes, accepted quotes and messages
Users install the PWA on their mobile devices with custom prompts and benefit from offline access
validation_criteria: All user inputs are validated with centralized sanitization and XSS protection
Quotes correctly follow accept/reject rules with automatic rejection of competing offers
AI vendor matching strictly matches ad categories and ranks vendors by location, keyword relevance, and ratings
Admins must be able to search, filter, and manage all user roles, ads, messages, and flags
The PWA must pass offline mode tests and support installation on iOS and Android devices
UI components meet WCAG AA accessibility guidelines including keyboard navigation and ARIA labels
Loading states and error boundary pages are implemented to handle all asynchronous data loading or failures gracefully
Indian localization formatting for currency and location data is correctly applied across UI
Real-time notification counts update accurately and clicking notifications navigates to correct context

features.name: Progressive Web App (PWA)
features.description: Full PWA implementation with installable app, offline support, service worker caching, custom install prompt with iOS/Android specific instructions, PWA manifest with app icons (8 sizes), and mobile app download section on homepage.

features.name: Premium Black + Neon Theme
features.description: Dark theme with jet black (#0D0D0D) background, neon cyan (#00FFFF) primary, and electric purple (#7A00FF) accents. Includes glassmorphic cards with neon glow effects.

features.name: India-Specific Localization
features.description: INR currency formatting with â‚¹ symbol, Indian Rupee number formatting (lakhs/crores), and comprehensive Indian city location system with 40+ cities organized by major/other/international.

features.name: Input Validation & Security
features.description: Centralized validation system with XSS protection, HTML sanitization, character limits, rate limiting, and comprehensive input validation for ads, quotes, and forms.

features.name: Hero Section
features.description: Premium hero banner with gradient overlays, neon-highlighted title, trust indicators (10,000+ users), and glassmorphic image grid with hover effects.

features.name: Site Header & Navigation
features.description: Responsive header with black background, neon-themed branding, mobile hamburger menu, and authentication state management.

features.name: Customer Testimonials
features.description: Testimonial cards featuring Indian personas (Riya Sharma, Arjun Mehta, Priya Nair) with star ratings and location badges.

features.name: Post Ad Wizard
features.description: 4-step wizard for customers to post ads: category selection, details with INR budget fields, image upload (up to 8), and preview. Includes Indian location selector and input validation.

features.name: Ad Listing & Browsing
features.description: Browse all customer ads with filtering by category, location, and search. Displays ads with INR price ranges, location, and status badges.

features.name: Ad Detail Page
features.description: Comprehensive ad view showing full details, images, budget in INR, location. Includes AI vendor recommendations, quote submission form for vendors, and quotes received section for customers.

features.name: Vendor Quote System
features.description: Complete quote workflow: vendors submit quotes with price_inr, delivery_days, and detailed message. Customers can accept/reject quotes. Accepting auto-rejects other pending quotes and closes the ad.

features.name: AI Vendor Matching
features.description: Keyword-based matching engine that scores vendors by category match (mandatory requirement), location proximity, keyword overlap, rating, experience, and verified status. Shows top 3-5 recommended vendors with match reasons. Fixed to ensure strict category matching.

features.name: Vendor Profile System
features.description: Comprehensive vendor profiles with avatar, business info, star ratings, review count, years of experience, specialties, location, portfolio gallery, and stats (total quotes, accepted, pending).

features.name: Review & Rating System
features.description: Customers can leave reviews and 1-5 star ratings for vendors they've worked with (accepted quotes). Automatic vendor rating calculation and display.

features.name: Notification Bell
features.description: Real-time notification dropdown in header showing new quotes, accepted quotes, and new messages with unread count badge. Click-to-navigate functionality.

features.name: Messaging System
features.description: Thread-based messaging between customers and vendors, linked to specific ads and quotes. Message history with timestamps.

features.name: Admin Dashboard - Overview
features.description: Protected admin panel with comprehensive metrics: total users, active ads, pending quotes, transaction value in INR, messages, flags. Platform health indicators including conversion rates.

features.name: Admin User Management
features.description: View, search, and filter all users by role (customer/vendor/admin). Displays user details, verified status, ratings for vendors.

features.name: Admin Ad Moderation
features.description: Search and filter all ads by status. View details, delete ads with confirmation. Shows ad owner, timestamps, locations, and budget in INR.

features.name: Admin Message Monitoring
features.description: Read-only view of all customer-vendor conversation threads for moderation. Shows participants, message counts, and last activity.

features.name: Admin Flag Management
features.description: Review and moderate flagged content (ads, responses, messages). View reasons, timestamps, and navigate to flagged items.

features.name: Admin Reports & Analytics
features.description: Detailed platform analytics: user growth, ad activity, transaction metrics in INR, top categories bar chart with percentages.

features.name: Vendor Browse Ads
features.description: Vendors can browse customer ads with filters by category, location, and sort by newest or budget. AI-powered relevance scoring.

features.name: Classifieds System
features.description: Vendors can post classified ads for their products/services with images, pricing in INR, and categorization.

features.name: Image Upload
features.description: Multi-image upload component with preview, supports up to 8 images, JPG/PNG formats.

features.name: Loading States
features.description: Skeleton loaders for cards, lists, and full pages. Loading spinners with neon cyan theme. Smooth transitions.

features.name: Error Handling
features.description: Comprehensive error handling with ErrorBoundary component, error.tsx, global-error.tsx, and not-found.tsx pages. User-friendly error messages with reload functionality.

features.name: Category Showcase
features.description: Visual category cards on homepage with icons and click-to-filter functionality for clothing, footwear, furniture, automobile, jewelry, gifting, and others.

features.name: Local Storage Database
features.description: Browser localStorage-based database system with full CRUD operations for users, ads, quotes, reviews, messages, threads, flags. Includes seed data with 3 roles (customer, vendor, admin).

features.name: Supabase Integration (Optional)
features.description: Optional Supabase backend integration with SQL migrations for quotes, reviews, and enhanced profiles. Includes Row Level Security policies.

features.name: Authentication System
features.description: Role-based authentication with customer, vendor, and admin roles. Session management via local storage or Supabase.

features.name: UI Component Library
features.description: Comprehensive set of Radix UI components styled with black + neon theme: buttons, cards, inputs, badges, dropdowns, dialogs, etc.

features.name: Accessibility Features
features.description: WCAG AA compliant with ARIA labels, keyboard navigation support, focus-visible styles with cyan outline, minimum 44px touch targets on mobile, reduced motion support.

features.name: Responsive Design
features.description: Mobile-first responsive design with breakpoints for mobile (375px), tablet (768px), and desktop (1440px+). Touch-optimized for mobile devices.
